Quickly stir in walnuts and cherries and turn into a oiled pan. Let stand until firm before cutting.

Makes 1 1/2 pounds.

ingredientList:
3 cups vinegar
1 cup water
4 cups sugar
1/4 cup salt
1 1/2 teaspoons turmeric
1 1/8 teaspoons mustard seeds
pickles, sliced
onions, sliced
recipeText:
Mix everything together.  

Put in a jar and shake back and forth several times during the day.
 
Keep in the refrigerator.

ingredientList:
2 gallons large cucumbers rings; about 15 cucumbers.
2 cups dehydrated limes
8 1/2 quarts water
1 cup white vinegar
1 tablespoon alum
1 small bottle red food coloring

Syrup:
1 package red hot candies
2 cups vinegar
2 cups water
10 cups sugar
8 cinnamon sticks
recipeText:
Put cucumber rings and lime in water and let stand for 24 hours.

Drain rings and wash in cool water.

Cover with cold water and let stand 3 hours.

Drain and add vinegar, alum, and food coloring.  

Cover with water, heat and simmer for 2 hours.

Drain well and discard liquid.

Mix syrup ingredients and bring to a boil.  Pour over rings. Keep lid on tight and let stand overnight.

Drain and reheat the syrup for 3 mornings.  On the 4th morning, heat rings and syrup to a boil. 

Pack in sanitized jars and seal.

Makes 4-5 quarts.

ingredientList:
1 can 8 oz tomato sauce
1 can 6 oz tomato paste
2 Teaspoon dried oregano or basil leaves
1 clove garlic
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients and heat. 

Makes 1 1/2 cups.

recipeDescription: Use whatever vegetables you have in your fridge to make these tangy Pickles--- no canning necessary!
ingredientList:
6 cups sugar
6 cups white vinegar
1/4 cup celery seeds
1/4 cup mustard seeds
2 tablespoons canning salt or kosher salt
10 medium carrots, halved lengthwise and cut into 2-inch pieces
3 cucumbers slices
3 red bell peppers, cut into 1 inch pieces
2 onions, halved and sliced
1 bunch green onions, cut into 2 inch pieces
recipeText:
In a Dutch Oven, combine, sugar, white vinegar, celery seeds, mustard seeds, and salt.  Heat.

In a large bowl combine carrots, cucumbers, red bell peppers, onions, and green onions.

Pour hot liquid over vegetables.  Cool. Transfer to jars if desired, cover tightly. 

Refrigerate for 8 hours before serving. Store in the fridge for up to one month.
 
Makes 7 Pints

*I cut my carrots with a serrated cutter into 4 pieces. 
*Used big sweet onions and not much of the green onions (The ones I bout were not that great.) 
*I don't know why you couldn't just use Esther's recipe with the celery seed.

recipeName: Refrigerator Pickles - Bev Wellmann - They were Easter Johnsons Pickles
ingredientList:
6 cups cucumbers, sliced thin
1 cup or more onions, sliced thin
1 cup green peppers, diced
2 cups sugar
1 cup vinegar
2 tablespoons salt
1 teaspoon celery seeds
recipeText: Mix together and pour over cucumbers, onions, and green peppers. Put in covered container and keep in refrigerator.

ingredientList:
8 cups well drained tomatoes
2 1/2 cups onions
2 cups green, red, or any sweet peppers
1/2 cup hot jalapeño peppers
6 cloves garlic
2 teaspoons cumin
2 teaspoons pepper
2 tablespoons canning or pickling salt
1/3 cup sugar
1/3 cup vinegar
1 (16-ounce) can tomato sauce
1 (12-ounce) can tomato paste
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients together. 

Boil for 10 - 15 minutes, until mixture thickens as desired.

recipeName: Sliced Red Apple Rings  - Grandma Alice Lendt
ingredientList:
4 - 6 apples
1 1/2 cups water
2 cups sugar
1/2 cup vinegar
6 whole cloves
1 - 2 sticks cinnamon
red food coloring
recipeText:
Wash, peel, and core apples. Slice them 1/2 inch thick.

Make a syrup of the sugar, water, and vinegar. Tied cloves and cinnamon in a bag. Cook the apples and spices in the syrup, turning often until the fruit is clear.

Remove the apples and spice bag from the mixture.

Add red food coloring to the syrup. Pour the syrup over the apples. Cool. Makes 12 - 16 rings.

ingredientList:
25 pounds toamtoes
5 onions about 7-8 cups chopped
4 red bell peppers
1 green bell pepper
4 6 oz cans tomato paste
1/4 cup soy sauce it's weird but trust us it deepens the tomato flavor like you won't believe
3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
2/3 cup brown sugar
1/4 cup salt
10 garlic cloves chopped or minced
3 tablespoons oregano dried
3 tablespoons basil dried
2 teaspoons red pepper flakes
2 bay leaves
1 1/4 cups lemon juice for jars
recipeText:
Boil tomatoes for 2 to 3 minutes. Take out and put into cold water. Take out of cold water and peel off skins. Quarter in food processor cover and process green peppers, onions in batches until finely chopped.  

In a large stock pot combine tomatoes do not discard excess juices from tomatoes, onion/ pepper mixture, tomato paste, soy sauce, worchestershire sauce, brown sugar, salt, garlic, oregano, basil, pepper flakes and bay leaves, bring to a boil and simmer 4 to 5 hours, stirring every 15 minutes or so (tomatoes burn easily so keep an eye on it).

Discard bay leaves If you want it smooth and thick you can put in a blender and blend tomatoes until smooth with no large chunk.

Add 2 Tablespoons lemon juice to 9 or 10 jars hot Quart jars ladle hot mixture into jars, leaving 1/2 in headspace at the top. Remove air bubbles, wipe rims, and adjust lids.

For water bath process for 40 minutes in a boiling water canner for altitudes 1,000 feet or less. For altitudes up to 3,000 feet, add 5 minutes, 6,000 feet, add 10 minutes 8,000 add 15 minutes, 10,000 add 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup salad oil
4 meds garlic minced
4 onions diced
2 tablespoons parsley Flakes
2 tablespoons salt
2-3 teaspoons pepper
1 teaspoon fennel seed
2 (12-ounce) cans tomato paste
1/4 cup sugar
2 tablespoons oregano
2 teaspoons basil
2 bay leaves
16 tomatoes peeled and diced
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients in a pot. (Can put in crock pot and let it cook for several hours.)

Simmer 2 hours covered.

Throw out bay leaves.

I line to sauce at this point.

Makes 4 quarts.  You can freeze this.

ingredientList:
6 1/2 cups cold water
1/2 cup picking salt
3 1/4 cups white vinegar
1 teaspoon alum
3 cloves garlic
Cucumbers dill fresh
recipeText:
Put washed cucumbers in a clean gallon jar with dill on the bottom and top. 
Mix other ingredients together and pour over cucumbers. 
Put lid on jar and set out in sun for 3 days; leave longer if sun is not bright.

Keep the pickles refrigerated. 

Marlene said she adds onions.

recipeDescription: From Marlene. Can use for Hot dish.
ingredientList:
20 pounds tomatoes
1 bunch celery chopped
5 onions chopped
1/2 cup flour
1/2 cup butter or margarine
1/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup salt
Min and add to above boil for 10 minutes
seal hot and tip jar over for 10 minutes or so
recipeText:
Boil tomatoes, celery, and onions for 3 hours. 
Mix flour, butter or margarine, sugar, and salt.  Add to the tomato mixture and boil for 10 minutes.

Seal hot and tip jar over for at least 10 minutes.

*Marlene often adds 2 peppers, 2/3 cup vinegar, 1 teaspoon celery seed, and a little mustard and garlic.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup margarine
1/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup brown sugar
1 cup flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
1 egg
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 cup nuts
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients.  Bake at 375 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. 

Makes about 4 dozen cookies.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon salt
1 cup margarine
3/4 cup brown sugar
3/4 cup sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 eggs
1 tablespoon hot water
1 package semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 cups rolled oats
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients, except chocolate chips and oats, together.  When mixture forms a dough, add chocolate chips and oats.

Drop on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 packages semi-sweet chocolate chips
5 cups corn flakes
1 cup dates cut small
1/4 teaspoon salt
2 squares chocolate bitter
1 cup chopped nuts
recipeText:
Melt chocolate in double boiler (or microwave).  Mix other ingredients.  Pour chocolate over mixture and blend well.

Form into balls and roll in powdered sugar.

ingredientList:
1 cup margarine
1 cup sugar
3 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
4 cups flour
2 teaspoons baking powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
Dates, ground
Sugar
Nuts
Leftover jams
recipeText:
Mix margarine, 1 cup sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, and salt.  

In a separate bowl, combine dates, some sugar, nuts, and any unused jams.  Can also add raisins, coconut, cookie crumbs, and maybe a little water. 

Roll out dough and cut in rounds, fill and with date mixture.

Bake.

ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
1/2 cup butter
1 cup raisins
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon celery
1/4 teaspoon cloves
2 cups flour
1 cup dates, chopped
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 eggs, beaten
1 cup walnuts, chopped
recipeText:
Combine and boil the above ingredients from sugar to the cloves for six minutes.

Then add flour, dates, vanilla, eggs, and walnuts.

Drop by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheet.

Bake for 10 minutes at 375 degrees.

ingredientList:
1 cup brown sugar
1 cup sugar
1 cup butter
2 eggs, beaten
2 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon baking powder
2 cups oats
2 cups corn flakes
1 cup coconut
1 cup nuts
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
Cream sugar, butter, and eggs.  Sift flour, salt, soda, and baking powder.  Add to creamed ingredients.  Add oatmeal, cornflakes, coconut, nuts, and vanilla.  

Roll into balls and press down on greased cookie sheet.  Bake 10 - 12 minutes at 350 degrees.

Makes 4 dozen cookies.  To vary recipe, add green and red maraschino cherries, cut into pieces, then bake.

ingredientList:
2 cups shortening
3 cups sugar
4 eggs
1/4 cup milk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
5 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Cream shortening, sugar, and eggs.  Stir in milk and vanilla.  Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together and stir into mixture until well blended.

Shape into a 1 1/2 inch thick roll.  Roll in waxed paper or wet cloth.  Chill several hours.  Slice thin.  

Bake at 35 degrees until light golden brown about 10 minutes.  

Makes 5 dozen cookies.

ingredientList:
1 cup white sugar
1/2 cup shortening
2/3 cup baking molasses
2 eggs
1 teaspoon cinnamon
1 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon ginger
2 3/4 cups flour
recipeText:
Either drop from a spoon or form into balls. Dip them in sugar and flatten some.

Bake at 350 degrees.

ingredientList:
1 cup brown sugar
3 eggs
1 cup sugar
1 1/2 cups peanut butter
4 1/2 cups oatmeal
3/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 tablespoon corn syrup
1/2 cup butter
2 teaspoons baking soda
1/4 pound semisweet chocolate chips
1/4 pound M&M's
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients, except chocolate, in a large bowl.  Stir in chocolate.  You may also add raisins.  Drop onto greased cookie sheets.  

Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 cups sugar
1/2 cup shortening
1/2 cup milk
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 pinch salt
3 cups quick cook oats
1 cup coconut
5 tablespoons baking cocoa
1/2 cup nuts
recipeText:
Mix sugar, shortening, milk, vanilla, and salt in a pan and heat until boiling.  Pour over oats, coconut, cocoa, and nuts.  Mix well. 

Drop on waxed paper and let sit until cool.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup milk
2 cups sugar
6 tablespoons coconut
1/4 cup butter
1/2 cup peanut butter
3 cups oatmeal
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
Boil milk, sugar, coconut, and butter for 1 minute.

Add peanut butter, oatmeal, and vanilla extract.

Mix all together and drop on wax paper.

ingredientList:
2 teaspoons grated orange rinds
2 cups raw oatmeal
1/2 cup salad oil
3/4 cup sugar
2 teaspoons salt
1 egg beaten
1/2 cup chopped nuts
recipeText:
Hand mix orange rinds, oatmeal, oil, sugar, and salt.  Chill overnight.

The next morning, add egg and nuts to mixture.

Bake 15 minutes.

Makes 30 cookies.

ingredientList:
1 cup softened butter
1 cup brown sugar
1/3 cup sugar
2 eggs
1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract
1 1/2 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
2 1/2 cups quick oatmeal
3/4 cup raisins
10 ounces package cinnamon chips
recipeText:
Beat butter and sugars until creamy. Add Eggs and vanilla. Beat well. 

Combine flour and baking soda. Add to the butter mixture. Stir in the oatmeal, raisins, and cinnamon chips. Batter will be stiff. 

Drop by heaping teaspoonful onto ungreased sheet.

Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350 degrees or until lightly brown.

Yields 48 cookies.

ingredientList:
2/3 cup flour
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
1/2 cup packed brown sugar
1 egg
1 tablespoon dark rum or  orange juice
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 1/2 cups oats
3/4 cup mixed dried fruit
2/3 cup semisweet chocolate chips
1/2 cup sweetened flaked coconut
1/3 cup roasted salted peanuts
recipeText:
Heat the oven to 375 degrees.  Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.  

Beat butter and brown sugar in a large bowl at medium-high speed 3 - 4 minutes, or until light and fluffy.  Beat in egg, rum, and vanilla until smooth.  

At low speed, beat in flour, baking soda, and salt.  Stir in remaining ingredients.  (Dough will be very stiff.)

Drop dough by 1 1/2 tablespoons on baking sheets at least 3 inches apart.  Bake 8 to 11 minutes or until golden brown and set.  Cool completely on wire rack.  Best if eaten within 3 days.

ingredientList:
Cookies:
2 cups brown sugar
1 cup crisco
1 cup oleo
1 1/2 cups sour milk (can use 2 tsp. vinegar)
2 teaspoons baking soda
6 cups minute oatmeal
2 cups flour
salt
vanilla extract

Filling:
1 cup cold water
1 package dates
3/4 cup sugar
recipeText:
Boil filling until pasty. Let filling cool.

Mix cookie ingredients. Roll thin, then cut with a cookie cutter. 

Put two cookies together with date mixture in the center (use very little date mix). 

Bake 10 minutes at 350°.

recipeName: Overnight Icebox Cookies  - Marlene and Ex
ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups margarine
1 cup brown sugar
1 cup sugar
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon cinnamon
2 eggs
4 1/2 cups flour
Vanilla extract
1 cup nuts
recipeText:
Cream margarine and sugars.  Add eggs and beat well until "fluffy".  Add dry ingredients, vanilla and nuts.  Make about 4 rolls and chill overnight.  

Slice thin.  Bake at 350 degrees.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup shortening or margarine
1/2 cup peanut butter
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup brown sugar
1 unbeaten egg
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 3/4 cups flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
little salt
Hershey's Kisses
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except Hershey's Kisses.

Shape in small ball. Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes.

Take out and add Hershey's Kiss in center of cookie.

Bake for 5 more minutes.

Makes 3 to 3 1/2 Dozen.

ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 egg
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 cup margarine
3 cups flour
1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients together.  Roll out dough and cut with cookie cutters.

Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes.

recipeName: The Official Authentic  Mrs. Fields Cookie Recipe
ingredientList:
1 pound butter
1 1/2 cups sugar
2 cups dark brown sugar
3 eggs
6 cups flour
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
1 1/2 teaspoons baking soda

4 to 5 cups chocolate chips
2 cups chopped nuts
OR
2 cups raisins
1 1-2 cups oatmeal
recipeText:
Cream together butter, and both sugars.  Add eggs, flour, vanilla, salt, and baking soda.  Beat 3 to 4 minutes.  Batter may be dry.

Add chocolate chips and nuts OR raisins and oatmeal.


Cover cookie sheet with waxed-paper. Scoop dough out with an ice cream scoop. Place 2 inches apart.  Change waxed paper for every new batch of cookies.

Bake at 350 degrees for 8-11 minutes.  Cookies may not be completely done.

Makes 4 to 5 dozen cookies.

*Do not half this recipe or it will not turn out.  This is Mrs. Fields recipe. It is authentic and was obtained from Mrs. Fields before they copyrighted and classified it.

recipeName: Chicken and Noodles Crock Pot - Erin (Kern) Eustice
ingredientList:
2 cans cream of chicken soup
2 cans chicken broth 15 oz
1 stick butter or margarine
1 pound chicken breasts fresh or frozen
1 package egg noodles 24 oz (I use Reamer)
recipeText:
In a crockpot, put chicken on bottom. Pour the chicken broth and soup on top, Top that with the stick of butter.  Cook on low for 6 to 7 hours.
Take the chicken out and shred. Put back in crockpot, add the frozen noodles and cook for 2 more hours. I stir every 30 minutes until done.

ingredientList:
3 Medium potatoes, thinly sliced
2 large carrots, thinly sliced
1 onion sliced
dry onion soup mix IF Desired
2-3 pounds beef chuck pot roast
1/2 cup water
salt and pepper
recipeText:
Put vegetables in bottom of crock-pot. Salt and pepper meat and put in pot. Cover with water.

Cover and cook: 
Low: 10-12 hours
High: 5-6 Hours

ingredientList:
3 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
2 large carrots, thinly sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
4 pounds beef rump roast
1/2 cup water
2 packages onion soup mix, dry
recipeText:
Put vegetables in the bottom of the crock-pot.  Salt and pepper meat, then put in pot.  Sprinkle on onion soup mix.  Add liquid.  

Cover, cook on low 10 - 12 hours (high 5-6 hours).

ingredientList:
1 package pork chops
can cream of chicken soup
package dry ranch salad dressing mix
recipeText:
Layer pork chops in crock pot. Pour cream of chicken soup over pork. Sprinkle dry ranch dressing on top.

Cover and cook: 
Low: 6 hours
High: 4 hours

Pork chops will be very tender and amazing flavor. Will also get very good gravy for mashed potatoes.

ingredientList:
1 angel food cake
1 package semisweet chocolate chips
4 tablespoons water
4 eggs
1 cup nuts
2 tablespoons sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
pinch of salt
1 pint whipped cream
recipeText:
Melt Choc Chips in water in double broiler.  When cool, add yolks. 

Beat whites until stiff and fold into chocolate chips mixture.

Add sugar, vanilla, nuts, and whipped cream.

Break cake into pieces and put into a 13 X 9 inch pan.  Pour mixture over cake, making sure it goes between pieces. 

Refrigerate.

ingredientList:
1 angel food cake, baked
1 (10-ounce) package frozen strawberries, or raspberries
1 (3-ounce) package strawberry Jello
1 cup boiling water
2 (8-ounce) packages whipped topping
fresh fruit
recipeText:
Drain thawed strawberries, reserving juice. 

Combine gelatin and boiling water in a bowl. Stir until gelatin is dissolved. 

Add enough water to strawberry juice to measure 1 cup. Stir into gelatin. 

Refrigerate until gelatin is slightly thickened. 

Beat gelatin until foamy and fold together with 1 container whipped topping.

Alternate layers of cake cubes and strawberry mixture into 10 inch tube Pan. 

Press lightly. 

Cover in refrigerator for 4 HOURS. 

Unmold cake into serving plate. Frost sides and top of cake with remaining whipped topping. 

Refrigerate until ready to serve. Garnish with fresh strawberries and mint leaves.

ingredientList:
1 stick margarine
1 cup flour
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup brown sugar
Apple slices
Cinnamon
recipeText:
Line a 9" x 9" x 2" cake pan with apple slices.  

Mix margarine, flour, and sugar.  (Can use 1 cup of sugar instead of 1/2 of each brown and regular sugar.)

Crumble mixture over the apples, and sprinkle with cinnamon.  Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

ingredientList:
5 cups unbleached flour
1 cup whole wheat flour
2 teaspoons salt
1 3/4 cups (or 2 cups) canola oil
7/8 cup water
8 cups peeled, cut, tart apples
4 tablespoons unbleached flour
1 tablespoon cinnamon
1 1/2 cups sugar
1/2 stick butter
recipeText:
Combine 5 cups flour, 1 cup whole wheat flour, 2 tsp salt, and canola oil, blend well.  Add the water.  Blend very well.  Press 1/2 to 2/3 of the dough into a 9" x 13" pan.  

Combine and blend the apples, 4 tablespoons flour, cinnamon, and sugar.  Put this mixture over the dough in the pan.  

Cut up 1/2 stick of butter and put spread over the apples.  

Crumble remaining crust on top of apples.  Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over the top.

Bake at 425 degrees for 15 minutes, reduce heat to 375degrees and bake for another 30 minutes or until bubbly.

ingredientList:
2 cups cut up apples
1 cup chopped walnut
1 cup sugar
1 cup flour
1 tsp baking soda
1/2 tsp salt
1 well beaten egg
1 tsp vanilla
3 tsp melted butter
recipeText:
Mix apples and nuts together. 

Mix together sugar, flour, baking soda, and salt; combine with the apple and nut mixture.

Combine eggs, vanilla and butter.  Pour over the dry ingredients and mix well. 

Spread in a buttered 9 inch square pan.

Bake at 350 for 40-50 minutes.

ingredientList:
3 sticks margarine
3 cups graham crackers, crushed
2 eggs
2 cups powdered sugar
5 bananas
1 can crushed pineapple
1 8-ounce container cool whip
1 small package nuts
1 small bottle maraschino cherries
recipeText:
Melt 1 1/2 sticks of margarine.  Mix with graham cracker crumbs and pat into 13 x 9 pan.

Mix 1 1/2 sticks of margarine with eggs and powdered sugar. Beat no less than 15 minutes.

Spread mixture over cracker crust.  Cover with a layer of sliced banana and drained crushed pineapple. 

Add a layer of cool whip.  Sprinkle with nuts and cherries and refrigerate overnight.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup butter, melted
16 graham crackers, crushed
1/4 cup sugar
8 ounces cream cheese
2 eggs
1/2 cup sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
Cinnamon (optional)
1 can blueberry pie filling
Cool whip
recipeText:
Crust:  Mix butter, graham crackers, and 1/4 cup of sugar.  Place in a 9" x 9" pan.  

Beat cream cheese, eggs, 1/2 cup sugar, and vanilla until thick and yellow.  Pour over crust.  Bake at 300 degrees for 25 minutes.  

Sprinkle with cinnamon while hot.  Let cool.  

Spoon can of blueberry pie filling over cream cheese mixture.  Refrigerate overnight.  Top with whipped cream or cool whip when serving.

ingredientList:
3 cups soft bread crumbs (6 slices of bread )
2 cups milk
2 eggs
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup raisins
sugar and cinnamon mixture
recipeText:
Spray 9 x9x2 inch baking dish with non-stick spray. Mix all ingredients together. 
Pour mixture into dish, sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.

Bake 40-45 minutes at 350 degrees or until knife inserted comes out clean.

Serve with ice cream.

ingredientList:
12 vanilla wafers
12 ounces cream cheese, softened
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 eggs
Whipped cream or cool whip
1 can of your favorite pie filling
recipeText:
Line twelve muffin cups with foil bake cups. Place one cookie in each. Set aside.

In large mixing bowl beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla on medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating until just combined after each addition.

Carefully spoon about 1/4 cup cream cheese mixture into each bake cup. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes.

Cool completely.  Leave in foil cups or peel away bake cups. Top with fruit and cool whip.  

Store in refrigerator.

ingredientList:
1 cup butter
8 (8 oz) envelopes Nestle Choco Bake, unsweetened chocolate flavor
4 eggs
2 teaspoons vanilla extract
2 1/2 cups sugar
1 1/2 cups flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup chopped nuts
recipeText:
In a small saucepan, melt butter, remove from heat.  Stir in Nestle Choco Bake; cool completely.  

In small mixer bowl, beat eggs and vanilla.  Gradually add sugar, beating until pale yellow.  

Blend in chocolate mixture.  Gradually add flour and salt.  Stir in nuts.  Spread in greased 13" x 9" pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

recipeName: Chocolate Chip Cookie Ice Cream Cake
ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbs
6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
3/4 cup mini semisweet chocolate chips
1 cup heavy cream
2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 gallon vanilla ice cream
24 soft chocolate chip cookies, cut into 1/2-inch pieces.  (about 4 cups) Divided.
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.  Combine graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and cinnamon in medium bowl until crumbs are moistened; stir in 3/4 cup mini semisweet chocolate chips.  Press into bottom of 13" x 9" baking pan.  Bake 6 minutes until set.  Cool completely on wire rack.  

Meanwhile, heat cream in medium saucepan over medium heat until hot and steamy.  Remove from heat; add bittersweet chocolate chips.  Let stand 1 minute; stir until melted and smooth.  Stir in vanilla.  Cool 20 minutes or until room temperature.

Place ice cream in refrigerator 20 minutes or until slightly softened.  Spread half of the ice cream over crust; quickly spread with spatula to level.  Sprinkle half of the cookies over ice cream.  Quickly spoon 1 1/4 cups of the chocolate sauce over cookies and ice cream; spread with spatula to cover.  Freeze 15 minutes to firm sauce.

Quickly spread remaining ice cream over sauce.  Sprinkle with remaining cookies; drizzle with remaining sauce.  If necessary, warm sauce in microwave for 10 to 20 seconds or until desired consistency.  Sauce will not completely cover the top of the layer.

Freeze 2 hours to firm sauce.  Wrap tightly; freeze overnight or up to 1 week.  Place in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes before serving to soften slightly.  Cut with warm knife.  Store in freezer.

recipeDescription: So very yummy!  Mom used to make this all the time when we were kids. - Melissa
ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups flour
1 cup chopped pecans, divided
1/2 cup margarine, melted
2 2/3 cups angel flake coconut
1 8-ounce package cream cheese, softened
3 cups milk
1 package (6 serving) instant vanilla pudding
1 8-ounce container cool whip
recipeText:
Combine flour, 1/2 cup pecans, & margarine.  Mix until flour is moistened.  Press evenly into the bottom of a 13" x 9" pan.  Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes.  Cool.

Toast remaining pecans and 2/3 cup coconut on a baking sheet at 325 degrees for 5 minutes or until light brown.

Beat cream cheese until soft.  Add 1/2 cup milk and blend until smooth.  Add remaining milk and pudding.  Mix well.  Add untoasted coconut and mix.  Pour mixture over the crust.  

Spread whipped topping over the pudding and sprinkle with toasted mixture.  Keep refrigerated.

ingredientList:
1 21-ounce can strawberry pie filling
1 pint vanilla ice cream
1 tablespoon lemon juice
3 medium bananas
1/4 cup coarse chopped almonds
Lettuce
recipeText:
Stir pie filling, soft ice cream, and lemon juice together.  Then stir in bananas and nuts.  Place mix into 8 individual molds.  Cover; freeze until firm.  

To serve, let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes.  Unmold onto lettuce-lined plates.

ingredientList:
Ice Cream Dessert
1/2 cup margarine
1 cup coconut
2 1/2 cups crispy rice cereal (Rice Krispies)
3/4 cup brown sugar
1 cup nuts
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 gallon ice cream
recipeText:
Melt margarine.  Add coconut, cereal, & nuts.  Toast at 350 degrees for about 10 minutes.  Stirring so it does not burn, add vanilla and brown sugar.  After removing from oven, cool.  

Press half in bottom of a pan.  Slice Ice cream over the top.  Top with the remaining mixture & freeze.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup margarine
1/4 cup brown sugar
1 cup flour
1/2 cup chopped nuts
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 10-ounce package frozen strawberries, broken apart
2 egg whites
2 tablespoons lemon juice
1 cup sugar
1 cup heavy cream
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
Make a "crust" by mixing the first 5 ingredients and bake in a 13" x 9" pan at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until light brown, stirring every 5 minutes.  

Mix strawberries, egg whites, lemon juice, and 1 cup of sugar.  Beat for 20 minutes until very stiff.  

Whip cream and 1 tsp. vanilla and fold into strawberry mix.  

Spoon some of the crust crumbs from the pan.  Top pan crumbs with strawberry mix, then top with spooned crumbs.

Keep Frozen.

ingredientList:
1 (20-ounce) can pineapple slices, keep juice
1 box yellow cake mix
1/2 cup vegetable Oil
3 eggs
1/3 cup butter
2/3 cup packed bown sugar
12 maraschino cherries, sliced in half
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. 

Spray 24 regular sized muffin cups with cooking spray.

Reserving pineapple juice, cut each pineapple slice into 4 pieces.

Beat the cake mix, oil, and eggs with an electric mixer on low speed for 30 seconds.  Whisk on high speed 2 min, scraping bowl.

In a separate bowl, mix butter and brown sugar.

Spoon 1 1/2 teaspoons of the butter mixture into each muffin cup.  Place 2 slices of pineapple in each cup.

Place half of a sliced cherry in the center of the pineapple pieces, then put 1/4 cup of cake mixture in each cup.

Bake 20 to 25 minutes. 

Let cool for 5 minutes. Run knife around edge of cupcake to loosen it from the tin.

ingredientList:
1 envelope unflavored jello
1/4 cup cold water
1/2 cup boiling water
1 cup strained orange juice
1 cup sugar
1 pint heavy cream, whipped
1 angel food cake, cooked
recipeText:
Dissolve unflavored jello in boiling water then stir in cold water.  Add orange juice and sugar and stir until completely dissolved.  Refrigerate until it becomes a heavy syrup.  Fold in whipped cream.

Break angel food cake into pieces or cut into squares.    Mix with the whip cream mixture, reserving some mixture to use as a topping for the dessert.

recipeName: Oreo or Hydrox Cookie Ice Cream
ingredientList:
1 pound cookie with icing, rolled fine
1/3 cup butter 
1/2 gallon of Butter Brickle ice cream
recipeText:
Melt butter and mix with cookie crumbs.  Put into 9 X 13 pan.

Set in freezer while you soften 1/2 gallon of Butter Brickle ice cream. 

Spread ice cream over crust and set in freezer.

ingredientList:
1 unbaked pie shell
1/4 cup butter
2/3 cup brown sugar
dash of salt
3 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp vanilla
3/4 cup corn syrup
1 1/2 cups pecan halves
recipeText:
Line pie plate with pastry shell.

Cream together the butter, brown sugar, and salt. Stir in remaining ingredients.  

Pour mixture into pie shell.

Bake at 450 degrees for 10 minutes. Then reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 30 minutes.

ingredientList:
CRUST:
3 cups mini pretzels, crushed
3/4 cup butter, melted
3 tablespoons sugar

FILLING:
1 8-ounce package cream cheese, softened
1 cup sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1 8-ounce container cool whip
10 ounces raspberries, fresh or frozen unsweetened

TOPPING:
1 box 8-serving size raspberry jello
2 cups boiling water
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. In medium bowl, mix crust ingredients. Press into ungreased 13x9-inch (3-quart) baking dish. Bake 10 minutes. Cool on cooling rack.

In medium bowl, beat cream cheese, 1 cup sugar and the vanilla with electric mixer on medium speed until smooth. Beat in whipped topping. Spread over cooled crust.

Spread raspberries over filling.

In medium bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water; set aside to cool to room temperature. 

Pour cooled gelatin on top of filling mixture.

Refrigerate 3 to 4 hours or until firm. Cut into 4 rows by 3 rows.

ingredientList:
2 cups cake flour
2 cups sugar
2 teaspoons baking powder
1 cup boiling water
5 egg whites
2 teaspoons cream of tartar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon vanilla extract or almond extract

FILLING:
1/4 cup cornstarch
2 cups raspberries
1 cup sugar
1 cup water

TOPPING:
cool whip or whipped cream
recipeText:
Sift flour, sugar and baking powder, add boiling water.  Mix together and let stand overnight. 

Beat egg whites, cream of tartar, and salt until it stands in points. Then fold in the vanilla. 

Put into 9 x13 ungreased pan. 

Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Tip over like angel food cake to cool.

Filling- Cook berries in saucepan until soft. Preserve juice, but strain to get rid of seeds. 

Add water to juice and mix in cornstarch. Add slowly to hot liquid to thicken.  Cool completely. 

Split the cake into 2 layers. Return 1 layer to a clean pan and spread 1/2 the filling over it. Put on the second layer of cake. 

Add remaining filling and top with whipped cream. Refrigerate overnight.

ingredientList:
3 cups rhubarb, cut up
2 eggs beaten
1 1/2 cups sugar
2 tablespoons flour
1 cup flour
1/2 cup brown sugar
1 teaspoon baking powder
6 tablespoons butter
recipeText:
Grease a 9x12 pan.

Put rhubarb in bottom of pan.

In a separate bowl, mix together eggs, sugar, and 2 tablespoon of flour; pour over rhubarb.

Crumble together the 1 cup of flour, brown sugar, baking powder, and butter; sprinkle over top.

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup sugar
3 tablespoons cornstarch
3 cups fresh rhubarb
2 cups fresh strawberries
1 1/2 cups uncooked quick cook oatmeal
1/2 cup firmly packed brown sugar
1/2 cup butter or margarine
1/2 cup flour
1 teaspoon cinnamon
recipeText:
Combine sugar and cornstarch. Add rhubarb and strawberries, mix well. Spoon into 8 x 8 baking dish.

Combine oats, brown sugar, butter, flour, and cinnamon. Mix well.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

Serve warm or cold with whipped cream or ice cream.

*If using frozen strawberries or Rhubarb, thaw before use.

ingredientList:
3 cups graham cracker crumbs
1/2 cup butter, melted
1 8-ounce package cream cheese
2 cups milk
1 3 1/2-ounce box instant vanilla pudding
1 quart strawberries, sliced lengthwise
1 8-ounce container cool whip
recipeText:
Mix graham cracker crumbs and butter.  Put 3/4 of crumbs in a 9" x 13" pan, saving 1/4 of crumbs for the topping.

Mix cream cheese and 1/2 cup milk until smooth.  Add vanilla pudding and remaining milk.  Mix for one minute until smooth.  Pour over crumbs.  Cover with sliced strawberries.

Top with cool whip and sprinkle on remaining graham cracker crumbs.

Refrigerate overnight.

ingredientList:
4 cups fresh strawberries, divided
1 14-ounce can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 cup lemon juice
8 ounces cool whip
8 oreo chocolate sandwich cookies, finely chopped
1 tablespoon butter, melted
recipeText:
Line an 8" x 4" loaf pan with foil.  Mash 2 cups of strawberries in a large bowl.  Stir in condensed milk, juice, and 2 cups of the cool whip.  Pour into pan.

Top with combined chopped cookies and butter; press into mixture.  Freeze at least 6 hours.  Top with remaining cool whip.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbs
1/4 cup sugar
1/3 cup melted butter
16 ounces cream cheese, softened (use 8 oz for less flavor)
1/4 cup sugar
2 tablespoons milk
8 ounces cool whip
2 3 1/2-ounce boxes chocolate instant pudding & pie filling mix (8 servings)
3 1/2 cups milk
8 ounces mini semisweet chocolate chips
recipeText:
Combine crumbs, 1 1/2 cup sugar, and melted butter.  Press firmly into bottom of 13x9 inch baking pan; chill 5 minutes.  For firmer crust, bake at 375 degrees for 8 minutes, cool.  

Beat cream cheese with 1/4 cup sugar & 2 TBSP milk until smooth.  Fold in half of the whipped topping.  Spread over crust.  

Prepare pudding using 3 1/3 cup milk.  Pour pudding over cream cheese layer.  Chill several hours or overnight.  

Spread remaining whipped topping over pudding.  Sprinkle chocolate chips on top to garnish.

ingredientList:
36 ounces frozen lemonade concentrate
1 quart ginger ale and ice
1 package frozen strawberries
recipeText:
Dilute lemonade according to directions on can. Pour into punch bowl.  Stir in strawberries. 

Just before serving, add ginger ale and ice.

*Makes 1 1/2 gallons.

ingredientList:
1 shot vodka
1/2 shot triple sec
splash of grenadine syrup
orange juice
splash of 7-Up
recipeText: Mix, serve, drink!

ingredientList:
2 cups white sugar
7 cups water
1 (12 oz) can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 ( 12oz) can frozen lemonade concentrate
2 cups vodka
ginger ale
recipeText:
Heat sugar and water until sugar dissolves.  Remove from heat, add frozen juices and vodka.  Mix well and freeze.

Scoop slush into glasses.  Pour ginger ale over mixture in glasses to serve.

recipeDescription: Käse is a German word for cheese.  Knopf is a German word for button.  Knepfla is a Slovak word for buttonhole.  Knöpfle is a German dialect word for button.  Often referred to as "cheese buttons", this is a popular food among Germans from Russia.
ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1 egg
water
dry cottage cheese
egg yolk
sugar
cinnamon
recipeText:
Mix flour with 1 egg.  Add a touch of water to help it roll out like pie dough.  Cut into squares.

Filling: mix dry cottage cheese with egg yolk, cinnamon, and sugar.

Put cheese drops on each dough square, close and seal tight.

Drop in boiling water.

Cut extra dough in pieces, brown in butter, and pour over dumplings.

After cooked put in serving bowl.


* Melissa found the following info online: 

** To make dry cottage cheese, rinse the cottage cheese with water to remove the creamy liquid.  Then put the cheese in a cheese cloth and squeeze and twist out all the moisture. Rinse the outside of the cloth, squeeze again, then open the cloth to get the cottage cheese out. 

** Other recipes say you can use a full egg in the cottage cheese mix. Use 3/4 to 1 cup of cottage cheese, 3 TBSP sugar, and 1/4 tsp of cinnamon.

** Some recipes suggest 1/2 tsp. baking powder.

** Drop 'buttons' carefully into boiling water for about 5 minutes. These dumplings float when they are done cooking. Drain.

** I a large saucepan, melt some butter; add buttons, making sure to have only one layer. Brown lightly on both sides. 

**Melissa found an alternate recipe online called "vareniki" or "varenyky" which is a Ukrainian word meaning "boiled thing" and refers to a type of dumpling.  The recipe calls for 3 eggs, 16 oz of dry cottage cheese (or ricotta cheese), 3 tablespoons of sugar, 1/2 tablespoon salt, 1 1/2 cups flour.  Beat 3 eggs in a bowl until light and fluffy.  Add dry cottage cheese.  Add sugar and salt; mix.  Slowly add flour until dough is workable.  Roll out and cut into 1" pieces.  Put in boiling water and let water come to a boil again.  Cook about 10 minutes, drain, and add butter on top.)

recipeName: Dumpling 2 - Frances Shepley  Friend or Relative of Eva(Schela) Kuntz
ingredientList:
2 cups flour
4 teaspoons baking powder
3/4 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons crisco
ADD
2 eggs
1/4 cup milk
recipeText: Cover and cook slow for 12 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1 egg
1 teaspoon baking powder
A little water
recipeText: Mix ingredients together.  Drop into simmering soup.  Cover and cook for about 15 - 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 cups flour
4 teaspoons baking powder
3/4 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons crisco
Add
2 eggs
1/4 cup milk
recipeText: Cover and Cook slow for 12 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1 egg
1 teaspoon baking powder
a little water
recipeText: Mix ingredients together. Drop into simmering soup. Cover and cook for about 15 - 20 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 cups flour
4 teaspoons baking powder
3/4 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons fat
2 eggs
1/4 cup milk
recipeText: Mix all ingredients.  Cover and cook dumplings for about 12 minutes.

recipeDescription: Recipe is over 90 years old (as of 2025)
ingredientList:
1 beaten egg slightly
1/2 tsp salt
1 1/2 cups flour
1 1/2 tsp baking powder
1/2 cup milk
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients in bowl, mix well. 

Drop into boiling stew or soup. Cook time depends on how large the dumplings are.  May take 20 minutes if large.

ingredientList:
1 cup flour
1 egg
water
dry cottage cheese
egg yolk
sugar
cinnamon
recipeText:
Mix flour with 1 egg.  Add a touch of water to help it roll out like pie dough.  Cut into squares.

Filling: mix dry cottage cheese with egg yolk, cinnamon, and sugar.

Put cheese drops on each dough square, close and seal tight.

Drop in boiling water.

Cut extra dough in pieces, brown in butter, and pour over dumplings.

After cooked put in serving bowl.


(Melissa found an alternate recipe online called "Lazy Vareniki".  The recipe calls for 3 eggs, 16 oz of dry cottage cheese (or ricotta cheese), 3 tablespoons of sugar, 1/2 tablespoon salt, 1 1/2 cups flour.  Beat 3 eggs in a bowl until light and fluffy.  Add dry cottage cheese.  Add sugar and salt; mix.  Slowly add flour until dough is workable.  Roll out and cut into 1" pieces.  Put in boiling water and let water come to a boil again.  Cook about 10 minutes, drain, and add butter on top.)

ingredientList:
1/2 Cup - 1 Cup celery
1/4 -1/2 cup onion
chicken, turkey or hamburger meat
1 28-oz can chow main vegetables
1 8-oz can sliced Water chestnuts
salt
pepper
flour
soy sauce
bag of chow main noodles
recipeText:
Cook and chop the chosen meat, save juice.

Brown celery & onion in butter.  Combine with meat, juice, vegetables, and chestnuts.

Add salt and pepper to taste.

Simmer for 15 Minutes.

Thicken with flour and water.

Add Soy sauce to taste.

*I usually double this recipe.

ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
4 eggs
1 cup cooking oils
pinch of salt
1 teaspoon baking powder
2 cups flour
1 can pie filling (any flavor)
sprinkle of cinnamon and sugar mix
recipeText:
Mix ingredients, except pie filling and cinnamon and sugar mix, to make a batter.

Spread 1/2 of this mixture in 9 x 13 pan greased pan.

Spread pie filling over batter.

Spread remaining batter over pie filling. Sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

When cool, drizzle with icing.

ingredientList:
3/4 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup margarine
1 cup sugar
1 egg
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
2 tablespoons milk
1 vinegar
2 cups chopped dates
recipeText: This is all the information that was on the card

ingredientList:
1 cup mandarin oranges
1 2/3 cups pineapple chunks or crushed
1 cup flaked coconut
1 cup sour cream cultured
1 cup miniature marshmallows
1/3 cup red cherries
recipeText:
Combine ingredients and chill overnight.

*can use fruit cocktail.

ingredientList:
5 cups rhubarb cut small pieces
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup water
1 package red jello
recipeText:
Cover rhubarb with boiling water and let set. 
 
Drain well.  

Add sugar and 1/2 cup water.  

Boil 10 minutes.  

Add jello. 

Seal jars.

ingredientList:
2 tablespoons olive oil
2 tablespoons brown sugar
2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar
1 teaspoon Dijon style mustard
1/4 teaspoon pepper
6 fillets salmon, thawed
recipeText:
Combine all ingredients except salmon fillets to make marinade.

Place salmon in shallow glass dish and pour 1/2 of the marinade over the salmon.  Reserve remaining marinade.

Cover and refrigerate one hour.

Discard marinade from glass dish.  Grill salmon over medium heat approximately 4 - 6 minutes.  Brush with reserved marinade several times during grilling.

ingredientList:
vanilla extract
powdered sugar
butter
heavy whipping cream
Salt
if using salted butter leave out the salt
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together.

ingredientList:
1 cup milk
3 tablespoons flour
1 cup butter, softened to room temperature
1 cup sugar
vanilla extract
recipeText:
Cook milk and flour until thick. Let cool.

Cream butter, sugar and vanilla. Add cooled milk and flour mixture.

Combine.  Should be light and fluffy.

recipeDescription: Found on Facebook.  Supposed to be very good.
ingredientList:
4 sticks unsalted butter store in refrigerator
8 cups confectioners' sugar sifted
large pinch of salt
1-3 tablespoons whole milk as needed
extract and flavoring
recipeText: Mix together. Adjust the consistency with milk as needed.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 cups crisco
2 pounds powdered sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon almond extract
1/2-1 teaspoon vanilla extract
1/2 cup hot water (maybe a little more)
recipeText: Put hot water on top of everything.  Beat until it forms stiff peaks.

recipeDescription: Prep Time: 15 minutes - Yield: frosts 2-layer or 13 x 9-inch cake
ingredientList:
1 cup sugar
1 cup evaporated milk
1/2 cup margarine or butter, softened
3 eggs, beaten
1 1/3 cups flaked coconut
1 cup chopped pecans or almonds
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
In medium saucepan, combine sugar, milk, margarine and eggs. Cook over medium heat until mixture begins to bubble, stirring constantly.

Stir in all remaining ingredients. 

Cool until of desired spreading consistency.

ingredientList:
2 1/2 tablespoons flour
1/2 cup milk
1/2 cup sugar
1/2 cup butter
recipeText:
2 1/2 tablespoons flour
1/2 cup milk
Cook flour and milk together to create a paste.  Cool completely.
Beat sugar and butter, add paste mixture, and beat a few minutes.

*Can also add a touch of vanilla and salt.

ingredientList:
6 tablespoons butter
1 cup sugar
6 tablespoons milk
butterscotch or chocolate chips
recipeText: Bring to a boil and boil for 4 minutes (only).  Add 1/2 cup chocolate chip or butterscotch until it tastes good.

ingredientList:
1 egg white
2 cups powdered sugar
1/2 cup shortening (Crisco)
1/2 teaspoon salt
2 1/2 tablespoons milk
2 tablespoons cake flour
Flavoring extract if desired
Food coloring if desired
recipeText:
Beat egg white until stiff.  Add 1 cup powdered sugar, beat.

In a separate bowl, mix 1 cup powdered sugar, shortening, salt, milk, flour, and flavoring.  Beat until well blended.  

Add the egg and powdered sugar mixture.  Beat well until the frosting stands in peaks, about 4 - 5 minutes. 

Use tooth pick to add food coloring and flavoring.

ingredientList:
3 cups sifted powdered sugar
2/3 cup shortening
2 1/2 tablespoons water
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, white
recipeText: Mix until smooth.

ingredientList:
1 ounce chocolate
1 cup sugar
1/3 cup milk
1/4 cup margarine or crisco
1/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients and bring to a boil. Boil 1 minute. 

Beat until cold add milk if to hard.

ingredientList:
2 squares chocolate
2 tablespoons butter
2 cups sugar
3/4 cup milk
pinch of salt
recipeText:
Melt butter and chocolate. Add sugar and milk. Cook until it forms into soft ball in cold water. 

Remove from stove and leave until cool. 

Beat until creamy and smooth. If it get to stiff to beat add a drop or two of milk.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup butter or margarine (half shortening may be used.)
1 cup brown sugar
1/4 cup milk
2 cups sifted powdered sugar
recipeText:
Melt butter, add brown sugar.  Boil over low heat 2 minutes, stirring constantly.

Add milk and continue stirring until mixture come to a boi. Remove from heat and cool.

Slowly add powdered sugar, beating well after each addition until spreading consistency.

Spread on cake.

recipeName: Calico Bean Bake - Jan from Oak Hills
recipeDescription: Jan from Oak Hills - Very Good Cook
ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef or Pork (I Use Pork, Juicier)
1 cup chopped onions
1/2 pound chopped bacon
1/2 cup ketchup
3/4 cup brown sugar
2 teaspoons vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1 pound 12 oz pork and beans
1 pound can butter beans
1 pound can kidney beans
recipeText:
Brown meat, cut up bacon, and onions in skillet. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 

Bake in Casserole, uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

I put in a crockpot on low for several hours stirring several times.

Crock Pot works just as well or even better, than baking in oven.

ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
20-ounce package frozen French fries
1 can golden mushroom soup
1 can cheddar cheese soup
recipeText:
Brown the ground beef. Drain the fat. Place the cooked meat in the bottom of a 9 x 13 pan.

Combine the soups and spread over the meat. Sprinkle french fries over the top.

Bake at 350 degrees for 45 to 55 minutes, until the fries are golden. 

Garnish with hamburger toppings- pickles, etc. if you like.

ingredientList:
1 pound egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 onion
1 cup celery
5 tablespoons margarine or butter
4 cups chicken
1 can cream of mushroom soup
3 cups chicken broth
6 tablespoons flour
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 cup grated cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Dice onion and celery, cook in butter.  Add chicken, soup, broth, and flour.  Salt and pepper to taste.  Sprinkle on cheese.  

Bake at 350 degrees  for 1 hour.

ingredientList:
2 chicken breasts
2 cans mixed vegetables
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of potato soup
pie crust
recipeText:
Cube chicken and sautee chicken. Mix chicken with vegetables and soups.

Add milk to make more soupy if desired.

Pour mixture into pie crust, top with other Pie Crust.

Bake 45 min until crust is done.

ingredientList:
1/2 Cup - 1 Cup celery
1/4 -1/2 cup onion
chicken, turkey or hamburger meat
1 28-oz can chow main vegetables
1 8-oz can sliced Water chestnuts
salt
pepper
flour
soy sauce
bag of chow main noodles
recipeText:
Cook and chop the chosen meat, save juice.

Brown celery & onion in butter.  Combine with meat, juice, vegetables, and chestnuts.

Add salt and pepper to taste.

Simmer for 15 Minutes.

Thicken with flour and water.

Add Soy sauce to taste.

*I usually double this recipe.

ingredientList:
1/2 of a chicken or 1 pound of hamburger
6 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup water
1 large bunch of celery, cut in 1/2 inch pieces
1 small onion, chopped
2 tablespoons cornstarch
1/4 cup water
1 (10 1/2-ounce) can water chestnuts, drained & sliced
2 1/2 cups bean sprouts, drained
2 ounces can mushrooms
dash salt
dash pepper
1 can chow main mixed vegetables
1 bag chow main noodles
recipeText:
Brown meat in oil or meat fat. Add soy sauce and 1 cup of water. Simmer 2 minutes.

Add celery and onion. Simmer 1.5 hours.

Blend corn starch and 1/4 cup water stir into meat mixture. Add chestnuts, bean sprouts, veggies, and mushrooms. Heat through, season and serve over chow main noodles, or cool and freeze.

ingredientList:
24 ounces pkg hash brown patties
1 pound hamberger
1 chopped onion
1 box frozen peas
1 cup celery diced
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 cup sour cream with chives
2 cups Cheddar cheese shredded
small can French Fried Onions
recipeText:
Put the hash brown patties into a buttered 9 x 13 or larger pan. 

Brown the hamburger, onion and celery. Spread over the hash browns. Sprinkle the peas over the hamburger layer. 

Combine the soups and sour cream. Spread over the other layers, sprinkle the cheese over the soup mixture. Sprinkle the fried onions on top.

Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or more.

ingredientList:
3 cups frozen hash brown potatoes
3/4 cup shredded pepper jack cheese
1 cup cooked ham diced
1/4 cup green onions
4 eggs beat
1-12 ounces can evaporated milk
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
1/8 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. 

Grease pan.  Spread hash browns evenly in bottom of pan.  Sprinkle with pepper jack cheese, ham, and green onion.

In a bowl, mix eggs, evaporated milk, pepper, and salt.  Pour the egg mixture over the potatoes.

May cover and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.

Bake for  40-45 minutes or 50-60 minutes if made ahead and ingredients are cold.

It is ready when knives comes out clean in the middles if pan.  Let stand for 5 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 pounds hamburger
onions chopped
seasoning to taste
2 10 1/2 ounce cans vegetable soup
1 pound frozen French fries
recipeText:
Brown hamburger, onion and seasoning. Add vegetable soup. Put into a 2 quart casserole dish.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

Remove from the oven and add the French Fries. 

Return to oven and bake for another 30 minutes.

ingredientList:
1 pound ground beef
1/2 cup onions
5 potatoes
4 carrots
1 cup celery (optional)
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 cup water
1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce (optional)
1 can corn
recipeText:
Brown the beef and the onions.  Chop potatoes, carrots, and celery.  Mix all ingredients and place in a cake pan.

Bake at 350 degrees for 30 - 40 minutes.

ingredientList:
Sauce:
20-oz can tomato
8-oz can tomato sauce
6-oz can tomato paste
2 cups water
garlic salt
salt
sweet basil
dry mustard
Worcestershire sauce
green pepper
onion
some catsup

Meat and Noodles:
2 pounds hamburger
1 pound lasagna noodles
2 T. oil

Cottage Cheese Mix:
2 eggs
1 quart cottage cheese
salt
pepper
parsley

Grated Cheese:
1 pack cheddar cheese, grated
1 package mozzarella cheese, grated
recipeText:
Brown the ground hamburger meat.  Mix the sauce ingredients.  Add sauce to meat and simmer for 3 hours.

Cook noodles with oil.  Drain in cold water and set aside.

Beat eggs and mix in the rest of the cottage cheese mix ingredients.

In a 9 X 13 Pan, alternate layers of noodles, cottage cheese mix, grated cheeses and meat sauce.  End the top layer with meat sauce topped with grated cheese.

Bake at 350 degrees.

ingredientList:
1/3 cup olive oil
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
1 teaspoon black pepper
1 tablespoon paprika
2 tablespoons garlic powder
2 tablespoons hot sauce
6-8 skin on red potatoes cut in 1/2 cubes
1 pound chicken breasts, cubed
2 cups fiesta blend cheese
1 cup bacon, cooked and crumbled (about 1/2 pound)
1 cup green onions diced
recipeText:
Pre heat oven to 400 degrees. Spray a 9 x13 baking dish with cooking spray.

In a large bowl, mix together the olive oil, salt , pepper, paprika, garlic powder, and hot sauce. Add the cubed potatoes and chicken and stir to coat. 

Carefully scoop the potatoes and chicken into the prepared baking dish.


Bake the potatoes and chicken for 55-60 minutes, stirring every 20 minutes until cooked through crispy and browned on the outside. 

When potatoes and chicken are fully cooked removed from oven. 

Top the cooked potatoes with the cheese, bacon and green onions. Return the casserole to the oven and bake for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.

Serve with hot sauce, ranch dressing, or sour cream.

ingredientList:
7 ounces small macaroni
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 pound ground beef
1 cup cottage cheese
2 1/2 cups spaghetti sauce
1 4-ounce can mushrooms
2 teaspoons oregano
1 cup sour cream
1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, shredded
recipeText:
Cook macaroni, rinse, drain.  Brown the meat.  Saute the pepper and onion.  Add the remaining ingredients and cooked macaroni to a 3-quart casserole.  

Bake 45 minutes at 350 degrees covered.  

Remove the cover, sprinkle cheese on top and bake for another 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
2 pounds frozen hash browns
1 can cream of celery soup
1 cup cream of mushroom soup
1 8-oz container sour cream and chives
shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Mix in layers and bake at 300 degrees, slow for 2 to 4 hours, or until brown on sides of pan. 

Stir, but not often as it will make potatoes mushy.  Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top before serving.

Stir 2 times.

ingredientList:
1 pound hamburger
1 onion diced
2 tablespoons oils
1 cup chopped celery
4 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup raw white rice
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of celery soup
1 teaspoon salt
1 1/2 cups water
recipeText:
Brown hamburger and onions in oil.  

Add all ingredients into a roaster.  

Bake at 350 degrees for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.  

Stir often, add water if needed.

ingredientList:
12 ounces cooked egg noodles
3 tablespoons oils
1 pound ground beef
1 onion
2 cups sauerkraut
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 cup water
recipeText:
Brown the beef and onion in the oil. Salt to taste. Put into bottom of a casserole dish and spread the egg noodles over the top of the meat.
Arrange the sauerkraut on top. Top off with the soup and water mixture. 

Bake 1 hour at 350 degrees.

recipeName: St. Anne's Hamburger Hot Dish - very good
ingredientList:
2 pounds ground beef
1 cup diced celery
1/2 cup chopped onions
1 pound wide noodles
1 8-ounce can mushroom pieces
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of celery soup
1 can cheddar cheese soup
1 tablespoon Natures Seasoning*
recipeText:
Brown beef.  Pre-cook celery and onion in water to cover, until barely tender.  Cook noodles for about 5 minutes and drain.  

Combine meat, celery with cooking liquids, mushrooms with liquid in can, and all soups and Natures Seasoning.  Mix thoroughly.  Add noodles and mix in.  

Put into Pam sprayed roaster pan.  Cover and refrigerate overnight or 6 - 8 hours to blend flavors. 

Bake at 300 degrees until heated through, approximately 1 - 2 hours.  Stir once or twice so it heats evenly.  Add a little water if mixture seems dry.

*Natures Seasoning can be found in the spice section of grocery stores.  It is made by Mortons Salt Co. and can be used in many dishes.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup onions
1/3 cup celery
1 pound ground beef
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup  (or cream of celery soup)
16 ounces frozen tater tots
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
recipeText:
Grease a 9" x 13" (2-quart) baking dish.  Brown onions, celery, and beef.  Drain off grease.  Spread mixture into the baking dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper.  

Pour can of soup over the mixture (an additional can is optional and makes the meal more juicy).  Top with frozen tater tots.

Bake at 400 degrees for 45 minutes, when mixture is bubbly.  Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and bake until cheese is melted.

ingredientList:
8 ounces uncooked corkscrew pasta
2 cups frozen mixed vegetables thawed
1 garlic clove minced
2 tablespoons margarine
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 cup milk
1 1/2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
1/8 teaspoon pepper
12 ounces can tuna
recipeText:
Cook pasta according to package. 

Saute vegetables and garlic in melted margarine until vegetables are crisp.

Stir in soup, milk, cheese and pepper.

Cook over medium heat stirring frequently until cheese us melted.

Stir in pasta and tuna, cook until heated.

ingredientList:
1/2 cup raw carrots, cut up
1/2 cup celery, cut fine
3 cups cooked turkey
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 cups milk
1/2 package onion soup mix
1 can drained asparagus or peas
Cooked noodles
recipeText: Mix all ingredients except noodles.  Place noodles in a pan.  Pour mixture over noodles and bake until carrots and celery are soft.

ingredientList:
turkey, cooked and shredded
1 big block of Velveeta cheese
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 stick butter
milk
recipeText:
Mix ingredients until cheese is melted and everything is hot.
Add water if the mixture is too sticky or thick.
Use your own judgment on how much of each to use.  

This is a great way to use leftover turkey to make a different meal.

recipeName: Cleans Sink, Shower and Bathtub Drains
recipeText:
Pour boiling Water down drain.
Add 1/2 cup baking powder.
Followed by 1/2 cup white vinegar.
Some people say you could add 1/4 cup of salt and that it helps.
Let this sit in the drain for some time.

recipeDescription: To make them bloom blue or pink you need a more acidic soil.
ingredientList:
vinegar
sugar
water
recipeText: Mix together.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup vinegar
3/4 cup vegetable oil

1 teaspoon Dawn dishwashing soap
3-4 tablespoons hydrogen peroxide
2 Tablespoons baking soda
Scrub on with scrub brush
recipeText: Scrub on with scrub brush.

ingredientList:
4 cups rhubarb Diced
4 cups sugar ( I use 2 Cups ) Lady said
1 small can crushed pineapple 14-oz
3 dozens cherry jello
recipeText:
COOK RHUBARB WITH SUGAR FOR 12 MINUTES. ADD PINEAPPLE AND COOK 3 MINUTES. ADD JELLO MIXING WELL AND POUR INTO BARS AND SEAL

Cook rhubarb with sugar for 12 minutes.  Add pineapple and cook 3 minutes.  Add jello and mix well.

Pour into jars and seal.

ingredientList:
3 cups sugar
3 cups water
1 6-ounce can orange juice concentrate
recipeText: Heat water and dissolve sugar.  Add orange juice and boil.  Set aside to cool.  Pour over fresh fruit and freeze.

ingredientList:
6 cups rhubarb cut up
5 cups sugar
1/2 pound or more oranges slices
recipeText:
Mix well and boil 20 minutes. 

Makes 8 jelly glasses.

ingredientList:
5 cups rhubarb cut small pieces
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup water
1 package red jello
recipeText:
Cover rhubarb with boiling water and let set. 
 
Drain well.  

Add sugar and 1/2 cup water.  

Boil 10 minutes.  

Add jello. 

Seal jars.

ingredientList:
6 cups cooked rhubarb
Sure Jell
4 cups sugar
1 can strawberry pie filling
1 small box jello
recipeText:
Mix Sure Jell with rhubarb.  Add sugar and let stand overnight.  

Boil rhubarb mixture for 20 minutes.  Add strawberry pie filling.  Boil for 5 minutes.  Add 1 small box of jello.

ingredientList:
7 cups cut up rhubarb
1 can strawberry pie mix
4 cups sugar
2 (3-ounce) boxes strawberry jello
recipeText:
Mix rhubarb, sugar and pie mix. Let stand for 15 minutes.

Boil for 10 to 15-+ minutes (I did 15 min.)

Add jello, stir until it's dissolved. 

Put in jars. Keep in refrigerator or freeze. 

Can substitute blueberry pie mix and blueberry jello.

It seems real sweet while hot, but once it was cool we really liked it.

ingredientList:
2 teaspoons butter
1 cup onions
1 1/2 cups diced celery
2 pounds ground beef
1 tablespoon mustard
1/2 cup water
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 teaspoon chili powder
1 1/2 tablespoons vinegar
3 tablespoons sugar
1 bottle (small) ketchup
recipeText: Brown beef and drain grease.  Mix all ingredients together and simmer.

ingredientList:
Pork (spare ribs, chops, etc.)
1 cup chopped onions
2 tablespoons brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon chili powder
1 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 cup tomato juice
1/2 cup water
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 cup vinegar
1/4 cup catsup
recipeText:
Pour chopped onions over pork.  Cover and bake at 450 degrees for 30 minutes.  

Mix and simmer remaining ingredients for 15 minutes.

Pour sauce over meat.  Reduce oven heat to 350 degrees and cook for additional for 1 1/2 to 2 hours.  Continually baste meat with sauce.  Add water to keep pork from browning.  Keep pork covered.

ingredientList:
spare ribs
1 cup chopped onions
2 tablespoons brown sugar
1/4 teaspoon chili powder
1 teaspoon salt
2T tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
1 cup tomato juice
1/2 cup water
1 tablespoon paprika
1 teaspoon dry mustard
1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper
1/4 cup vinegar
1/4 cup catsup
recipeText:
Place spare ribs in pan, cover with chopped onions.

Bake at 450 degrees for 30 minutes.

Mix the remainder ingredients and simmer sauce for 15 minutes.

When ribs are baked, take out of oven and pour sauce over ribs.  Cover with foil.

Turn heat down to 350 degrees and bake ribs for an additional 1 1/2 - 2 hours.

Periodically, baste with sauce and add water to keep ribs from browning.

ingredientList:
6 cups soft bread crumbs
1 1/2 cups milk
4 eggs
3 pounds ground beef (90% lean or better)
1 pound ground pork (Jimmy Dean's Hot Sausage works great)
2 finely chopped onions
2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce
1 tablespoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1 cup ketchup
recipeText:
Soak bread in milk.  Add eggs and beat with rotary beater.  Add meat, onion, celery, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, and 1/4 cup catsup.  

Form into 2 loaves for 8 servings, for 16 servings, 4 loaves .  Place in loaf pan or 13x9x2 inch baking pan.  

Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. 

Spread the rest of the catsup over top of loaves and bake extra 15 minutes.

ingredientList:
Brisket in Marinade:
5 pounds whole brisket
3 ounces liquid smoke (Wright's)
garlic salt
onion powder
celery seed


Sauce:
4 tablespoons brown sugar
4 tablespoons white vinegar
4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce
1 cup catsup
4 teaspoons dry mustard
1 teaspoon salt
dash cayenne pepper
10 drops tabasco
recipeText:
Prepare the brisket with marinade ingredients.  Cover and refrigerate overnight.

Bake covered at 275 degrees; 1 hour per pound of brisket.

Cool completely in refrigerator.

Slice or pull apart meat, keeping the juices in the pan. 

Mix the sauce ingredients and pour 1/2 over beef.  Reserve 1/2 to pass.


Bake uncovered at 300 degrees for 1 hour.

Serve on onion buns.

ingredientList:
1 tablespoon dried parsley
1 tablespoon dried chives
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
6 boneless skinless chicken breast halves
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
3 tablespoons butter, cut into 6 equal slices
1 tablespoon seasoned bread crumbs, divided
1/8 teaspoon paprika
recipeText:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.  

In a small bowl, combine the parsley, chives, and garlic powder; set aside.  

Between 2 pieces of waxed paper, gently pound the chicken to 1/4-inch thickness with a mallet or rolling pin.  

Sprinkle both sides of each breast lightly with salt and pepper, then sprinkle 1 teaspoon of the parsley mixture on one side of each chicken piece.  

Place a slice of butter in the center of each piece of chicken and roll each chicken breast tightly, tucking in the sides as you roll.  

Place the rolls seam side down in medium-sized muffin tins that have been coated with nonstick vegetable spray; sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of the seasoned bread crumbs and some paprika over each roll.  

Bake for 25 - 30 minutes until no pink remains and juices run clear.  Serve immediately.

ingredientList:
1/2 of a chicken or 1 pound of hamburger
6 tablespoons soy sauce
1 cup water
1 large bunch of celery, cut in 1/2 inch pieces
1 small onion, chopped
2 tablespoons cornstarch
1/4 cup water
1 10 1/2-ounce can water chestnuts, drained & sliced
2 1/2 cups bean sprouts, drained
2 ounces can mushrooms
Dash salt
Dash pepper
1 can chow main mixed vegetables
1 bag chow main noodles
recipeText:
Brown meat in oil or meat fat.  Add soy sauce and 1 cup of water.  Simmer 2 minutes.

Add celery and onion.  Simmer 1.5 hours.  

Blend corn starch and 1/4 cup water; stir into meat mixture.  Add chestnuts, bean sprouts, veggies, and mushrooms.  

Heat through, season and serve over chow main noodles, or cool and freeze.

ingredientList:
2 pounds chicken tenders or 4 Large chicken breasts
2 Sleeves Ritz crackers
1/8 teaspoon pepper
1/2 cup milk
3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 Tablespoon dried parsley

SAUCE:
10 OZ Can cream of chicken soup
2 Tablespoon sour cream
2 tablespoons butter
recipeText:
If using chicken breasts cut breasts into tender sized pieces. Crush crackers and toss with salt and pepper.

Pour milk, cheese, and crackers crumbs into 3 separate small pans.

Dip each piece of chicken into the milk and then the cheese; press the cheese into the chicken with you fingers. Then press the cheesy coated chicken into the cracker crumbs and press it in.

Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray and lay the chicken in the pan.

Sprinkle the dried parsley over the chicken.

Cover with tin foil.

Bake at 400 degrees for 35 minutes. 

Remove tin foil, bake additional 10-15 minutes or until the edges of the chicken are golden brown and crispy.

In a medium sized sauce pan combine the cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and butter with a whisk. Stir it over a medium high heat until the sauce is nice and hot. Serve over the chicken.

ingredientList:
Ham balls:
2 grounds smoked ham
2 cups crackers crumbs
2 eggs
1 pound ground lean pork
1 cup milk

Glaze:
1/2 cup vinegar,
1 cup brown sugar
2 teaspoon horse radish
1/2 cup water
1 tsp. prepared mustard
recipeText:
Mix and shape into balls.  Arrange in single layer in baking pan.

Bake for 45 minutes at 350 degrees.

Make glaze.  Baste occasionally.

ingredientList:
3 tablespoons fresh lime juice
1 tablespoon olive oil
1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon or thyme, divided
1/2 teaspoon grated lemon peels
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
1 1/4 pounds beef tenderloin filets, cut 1 inch thick.
1/3 cup sour cream
1 teaspoon Dijon style mustard
recipeText:
In a resealable plastic bag, combine lemon juice, olive oil, 2 teaspoons of the tarragon, lemon peel, salt, and pepper; add steaks.  Turn to coat well; seal bag and chill 2 to 24 hours, turning occasionally.

Meanwhile, for sauce, in a small bowl stir together sour cream, mustard, and remaining 1 teaspoon tarragon.  Cover and chill until serving time.

Preheat grill to medium.  Remove steak from marinade; discard marinade.  Grill 8 - 12 minutes for medium rare, or 12 - 15 minutes for medium.

Serve with sauce.  Garnish with additional fresh tarragon, if desired.

ingredientList:
1 1/2 pounds ground beef
1 1/2 ground pork
1 package lipton soup
2 eggs
1/2 cup milk
1 cup bread crumbs
1/2 cup ketchup
recipeText: Mix all together and bake in a bread pan.

ingredientList:
1/4 cup onion, browned
1 pound hamburger meat
1 can tomato soup 
1/2 cup shredded cheese cheddar
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. oregano
dash of pepper
24 slices mozzarella cheese (or shredded)
small buns or English Muffins
recipeText:
Simmer onions, hamburger meat, tomato soup, shredded cheddar cheese, oregano, and pepper in a pan for 10 minutes, until meat is cooked through.  
*Can also add 1 can small mushrooms.

Spread mixture on buns.  Place a slice of mozzarella or shredded mozzarella cheese on top of meat mixture.  Put under broiler until brown.

*These can be made up ahead of time and frozen on a cookie sheet.  Be sure they heat all the way through.  Bake 325 to 350 degrees until cheese is browned, not under broiler.

Makes about 24 pizza burgers.

ingredientList:
3 pounds pork boned loin of pork roast all chops
3 1/2 cups sauerkraut
2 cups water
2 raw potatoes pealed and grated

Dumplings:
4 potatoes peaeled
1 egg
dash salt
1 to 2 slices bread crumbs
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup flour
recipeText:
Put pork in heavy kettle. Add sauerkraut. Add 2 cups water, cover and simmer for 2 1/2 hours, or until meat is tender. 

Add additional water if necessary

Add grated raw potatoes to thicken. Cook on low an additional 7 to 12 minutes.

ingredientList:
3 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
2 large carrots, thinly sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon pepper
4 pounds beef rump roast
1/2 cup water
2 packages onion soup mix, dry
recipeText:
Put vegetables in the bottom of the crock-pot.  Salt and pepper meat, then put in pot.  Sprinkle on onion soup mix.  Add liquid.  

Cover, cook on low 10 - 12 hours (high 5-6 hours).

recipeName: Salad Bar Vegetable Beef Stir-Fry - Michelle Bertrang
ingredientList:
1/3 cup water
1 tablespoon cornstarch
2 tablespoons soy sauce
2 tablespoons honey
1/2 teaspoon ginger
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon cinnamon
2 tablespoons oil
3/4 pound boneless beef sirloin steaks, slightly frozen, cut into paper-thin strips about 2" x 1"
2 cloves garlic,minced
1 1/2 pounds assorted, cut-up fresh vegetables
recipeText:
In a small bowl, blend water, cornstarch, soy sauce, honey, ginger, salt, and cinnamon; set aside.  

Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat until hot.  Add 1 tablespoon of oil; heat until it ripples.  Add beef and garlic.  Cook and stir 3 to 4 minutes or until browned.  Remove and reserve beef and any liquid in skillet.

In the same skillet, over medium heat, heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil until it ripples.  Add firm vegetables (broccoli, carrots, cauliflower); cook and stir 2 minutes or until vegetables are slightly limp.  

Add less firm vegetables (onions, green or red bell peppers); cook and stir 2 - 3 minutes.  Add soft vegetables (mushrooms, bean sprouts, pea pods), cook and stir 1 - 2 minutes or until all vegetables are crisp-tender.  

Return beef and any liquid to skillet; stir in sauce mixture.  Cook and stir until sauce is bubble and thickened.  If using tomatoes, stir and heat until warm.  Serve with hot cooked rice or Chinese noodles, if desired.

ingredientList:
2 pounds chicken
1/4 cup brown sugar
1/2 cup soy sauce
2 tablespoons cider vinegar
1/2 teaspoon ginger
1 clove garlic
1/8 teaspoon pepper
7 cups water
1/2 cup baking soda
1/3 cup lemon juice
1/4 cup vinegar

4 pounds ground beef
1 pound pork sausages 
4 cups bread crumbs
3 eggs
3 cups milk
3/4 cup minced onions
3/4 teaspoon ginger
3/4 teaspoon nutmeg
3/4 teaspoon pepper
2 tablespoons salt
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients together and cook in frying pan.  Use extra milk in the pan as needed to prevent burning.

To make the gravy, add extra milk and flour to the pan grease.  Stir until thick and pour over meatballs.  Add extra ginger, nutmeg, and pepper as needed.

ingredientList:
3-3 1/2 cups flour (2 for recipe)
1 package rapid yeast
1 cup very warm water (125 to 130 degrees)
2 tablespoons oils
3/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Mix 2 cups flour, yeast, salt, and oil. 

Stir in water. Stir in more flour, enough to make the dough soft.

Knead for 4 to 6 minutes on flour board. Divide into 2 balls.

Makes two 12-inch pizzas.

ingredientList:
1/4 brown sugar
1/4 dark corn syrup
2 tablespoons butter or margarine
1/2 teaspoon salt
3 cups Kix cereal
1 cup walnuts
ice cream
recipeText:
Heat oven to 325 degrees. Butter a cookie sheet pan or jelly roll pan. 

Heat brown sugar, corn syrup, butter, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat; stirring constantly until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes.

Remove from heat; stir in cereal and walnuts until well coated. 

Spread mixture evenly in pan. 

Bake uncovered 15 minutes. 

Cool 10 minutes, then loosen mixture let stand until firm, about 30 minutes. 

Break apart. Serve over ice cream.

Store in airtight container. 

*Makes about 6 cups.

ingredientList:
3 egg yolk
1 whole egg
3 Tablespoons cold water
1 teaspoon salt
2 cups flour
recipeText:
Beat egg and egg yolks until very light.

Beat in 3 Tablespoons cold water.

Mix in salt and flour.  

Leave stand over night.

Work with hands. Divide in 3 parts and roll until very thin.

ingredientList:
1 cup ketchup
1 1/2 cups mozola oil
3/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup vinegar
1 teaspoon paprika
1 teaspoon celery salt
1 teaspoon grated onions
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon pepper
1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
Juice of one lemon
1 clove garlic
recipeText: Mix all ingredients in mixer for 15 minutes.  Drop a clove of garlic in bottom of jar when you pour dressing into the jar.  Store in the refrigerator.

ingredientList:
3 cups cooked white rice
3 tablespoons sesame oil
1 cup frozen peas and carrots thawed
1 small onion chopped
1 teaspoon minced garlic
2 eggs slightly beaten
1/4 cup soy sauce
shrimp or chicken (optional)
recipeText:
On medium high heat, heat the oil in a large skillet or wok. 

Add the peas, carrots, onion, and garlic. Stir fry until tender. 

Lower the heat to medium low and push to one side of skillet.

Add egg and stir fry until scrambled,

Add the rice and soy sauce, blend all together well. Stir fry until thoroughly heated. 

*Can add green onion.

*Add shrimp or chicken for a complete meal

ingredientList:
2 pounds chunk frozen hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup
3/4 cup chopped onions
1 stick melted butter or margarine
8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon garlic salt
1 cup sour cream
2 cups crushed corn flakes
recipeText:
Mix hash browns, soup, onion, 1/2 stick melted margarine, salts, and sour cream together, put in baking dish.

Mix 1/2 stick melted margarine & corn flakes, and place over the top of potato mixture.

Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours.

ingredientList:
4 4-serving boxes jello or 2 large 8-serving size
2 1/2 cups boiling water
recipeText:
Completely dissolve gelatin in boiling water . Pour into 13 x9 inch pan. 

Chill until firm; about 3 hours.  

Dip pan in warm water approximately 15 seconds. Cut into squares or use cookie cutter. Lift shapes form pan.

ingredientList:
4 cups mashed potatoes
1/4 cup crisco
1/4 cup butter
1/2 cup cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt (or slightly more)
3 cups flour
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except flour.  Let it sit overnight.

Cool throughly.  Then add the flour.  Roll out dough and fry at 450 degrees to 500 degrees.

recipeName: Lefse - altered to include potato ingredients
ingredientList:
2-2/3 cups instant Idahoan potatoes flakes
2-2/3 cups water
1 cup milk
1/4 cup crisco
6 tablespoons butter
1/2 cup cream
1 tablespoon sugar
1-1/2 teaspoons salt (or slightly more)
3 cups flour
recipeText:
Mix all ingredients except flour.  Let it sit overnight.

Cool throughly.  Then add the flour.  Roll out dough and fry at 450 degrees to 500 degrees.

ingredientList:
1 large onion thinly sliced
1 cup flour
1 1/2 teaspoons salt
1/2 teaspoon white peppers
1 cup vegetable oil
recipeText:
Separate the onion slices into rings. 

In a medium bowl, combine the flour, salt, and pepper. Mix well.

In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium high heat. 

Place the onion rings in mixture and coat well then carefully place in the hot oil.

Fry for 6 to 8 minutes until golden. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate and serve. Can sprinkle with salt.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
1 cup milk
1 cup flour
1/4 teaspoon salt
recipeText:
Generously grease six 6-ounce custard cups or 8 muffin cups.  Set aside.

In large mixing bowl beat eggs.  Add remaining ingredients and beat on low speed just until smooth.  Fill cups about 3/4 full with batter.

Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, then reduce to 325 degrees and bake for 15 minutes longer, or until deep golden brown.

Remove from pan and serve warm.

ingredientList:
1 package kool-aid
1 package jello Same Flavor
1 cup sugar or less sugar (We preferred less sugar)
2 cups hot water
3 cup cold water
recipeText: Dissolve kool-aid, jello, and sugar in hot water.  Add cold water. Freeze.

ingredientList:
1 pkg jello
1 pkg koolaid any flavor
1 cup sugar
2 cups Hot water
2 cups cold water
recipeText:
Dissolve above ingredients in 2 cups hot water.

Add 2 cups cold water. Mix well.

Pour into popsicle containers. Freeze.

*I preferred less sugar

ingredientList:
1 egg
2 tablespoons sugar
1 teaspoon salt
2 tablespoons oils
ADD
3/4 cup milk
3/4 cup flour
1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
1/3 cup corn meal

1 package instant chocolate pudding
3 1/2 cups milk
1/4 cup sugar
recipeText: Mix together and freeze in mold or cold drink cups. Use plastic spoons or wooden sticks.

ingredientList:
1 8-ounce can tomato sauce
2 teaspoons dried oregano or basil
1 clove minced garlic
recipeText: Mix all ingredients together.  Makes 1 1/2 cup.

ingredientList:
1 cup dates (cut fine)
1 cup chopped nuts
1 can Eagle Brand Milk
1 box Ritz crackers
1 stick butter
2 cups powdered sugar
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
Milk
recipeText:
Put dates and milk in a double boiler.  Cook about 8 - 10 minutes or until mixture thickens.  Take off heat and add nuts.  Cover each Ritz cracker with mixture.  

Bake at 300 degrees for 5 - 10 minutes.  Cool.  

Mix butter and powdered sugar, and enough milk to make spreading easy.  Frost crackers.

Makes 5 dozen.

ingredientList:
2 eggs
1 teaspoon sugar
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 cup milk
1 cup flour
Frosting:
3 cups sifted powdered sugar
2/3 cup shortening Crisco
2 1/2 tablespoons water
1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipeText:
Use a fork to beat eggs, sugar, and salt.  Don't beat too much or they will have too much air in them.  Add flour.  Then slowly add milk while keeping bumps out of the batter.  

Heat lard to 350 degrees to 360 degrees; put rosette iron into lard and heat.  Dip iron into batter, then into lard for frying.  Fry about one minute.  

Mix frosting ingredients and frost rosettes.

recipeDescription: From Alice Lendt.  These are so yummy, a child favorite!
ingredientList:
4 - 6 apples
1 1/2 cups water
2 cups sugar
1/2 cup vinegar
6 whole cloves
1 - 2 sticks cinnamon
Red food coloring
recipeText:
Wash, peel, and core apples.  Slice them 1/2 inch thick.

Make a syrup of the sugar, water, and vinegar.  Tied cloves and cinnamon in a bag.  Cook the apples and spices in the syrup, turning often until the fruit is clear.

Remove the apples and spice bag from the mixture.

Add red food coloring to the syrup.  Pour the syrup over the apples.  Cool.  Makes 12 - 16 rings.

ingredientList:
Pumpkin Seeds
butter
olive oil
sea salt
recipeText:
Preheat oven to 250 degrees.

In a large bowl, combine pumpkin seeds with melted butter and olive oil, stirring to coat seeds evenly. 

Add sea salt, toss.

Spread the seeds on a sheet pan.

Roast about 1 hour.

ingredientList:
2 1/2 cups lightly toasted coconut
1/3 cup margarine
3 ounces cream cheese, softened
14 ounces sweetened condensed milk
2 1/2 cups strawberries, mashed or pureed (about 1 1/2 cups)
3 tablespoons lemon juice
1/2 pint heavy cream, whipped
recipeText:
In a large saucepan, melt margarine; stir in toasted coconut.  Mix well.  Press into the bottom and up sides of 9-inch pie pan; chill.  In large bowl, beat cheese until fluffy, beat in condensed milk.  Sir in pureed strawberries and lemon juice.  Fold in whipped cream.  

Pour into coconut crust (mixture should move slightly).  Freeze 4 hours or until form.  

Before serving, garnish with additional fresh strawberries.

ingredientList:
1/2 pound marshmallows
1/4 cup milk
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/4 cup green creme de menthe
2 tablespoons white crème de cacao
1 cup whipped cream
pie crust (baked pie crust, graham cracker crust, or chocolate sandwich crust)
